#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define min(a,b) a<b?a:b
char str[100005];
int dev1(char *str)
{
	//cout<<str<<endl;
		int i=0,count=0;
		while(*(str+i)!='\0')
		{
			if((i-count)%2==0)
			{
				if(*(str+i)!='Y')
				count++;
			}
			else
			{
				if(*(str+i)!='X')
				count++;
			}
			i++;
		}
		//cout<<count<<endl;
		return count;
}
int dev(char *str)
{
	//cout<<str<<endl;
		int i=0,count=0;
		while(*(str+i)!='\0')
		{
			if((i-count)%2==0)
			{
				if(*(str+i)!='X')
				count++;
			}
			else
			{
				if(*(str+i)!='Y')
				count++;
			}
			i++;
		}
	//	cout<<count<<endl;
		return count;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	getchar();
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",str);
		//cout<<str<<endl;
		printf("%d\n",min(dev(str),dev1(str)));
	}
}
